headline: Student experience blogs
text: Careers in Theory  the careers group at the University of London looks at how to achieve and maintain job satisfaction. Don't Waste Your Time  a blog from a learning technologist chronicling his attempts to improve the student experience. PhD Life - a blog written by PhD students from Warwick University on the trials, tribulations and triumphs of doing a doctorate.  Student Development  Stuart Johnson of the University of Leicester careers service discusses how to better student development. The Virtual Leader - about how to use the web and social media in teaching and learning to promote engagement.
